title:
Welcome to Adventure!
Type 'help' for info on how to play

lantern.description: An old rusty lantern.  Filled with oil, but in very poor condition.

action.description: The area is now illuminated, but the lantern won't stay lit for long.

key.description: A simple, large iron key.  Meant for opening a heavy lock.

sword.description: A dull and chipped blade.  Heavy enough to hurt something.

0:0.description: You wake up in a room filed with old wooden crates.  You have no idea how you got here.

0:1.description: The room is pitch black.  You can hear something shuffling in the corner.

light: You can't see anything.  The shuffling is getting closer.
There is a perfectly average looking villager standing alone in the room.  He stares at you blankly.
